title: New Advanced Watts Beauty 2% Cool Gel Retinol Serum 5 (Vitamin A) - Hyaluronic Acid Gel Blend for Uneven Tones, Aging Skin, Wrinkles, Fine Lines, Acne & More - Made in the USA - 98% Natural / 72% Organic - 60ml
description: This New Watts Beauty Retinol Formula is stronger and offers the same great results as some of our other Vitamin A products but expect results much faster. The Popular Retinol Ingredient Enhanced by the Hyaluronic Acid and Phospholipids offers a soothing yet effective product. Vitamin A is proven to improve mottled pigmentation, fine lines, wrinkles, skin texture, skin tone, color, as well as your skins hydration levels and pore size. This suspension of Retinol (Vitamin A) contains a synergistic blend of active ingredients to help to soften and heal the skin with the most efficient and effective moisturizing system. Vitamin A has a molecular structure that's tiny enough to get into the lower layers of skin where it finds collagen and elastin. Please note that this product contains Retinol and may result in peeling and redness as the product helps to remove dead skin cells to encourage the new skin cell generation. It may cause sensitivity to light so be sure to wear sunscreen and moisturize the area daily after exfoliating the dead skin cells.

title: Olay Pro-X Replacement Brush Heads 2 Count
description: Exfoliation is the first step to reveal youthful, bright, even skin. Continue to experience professional-level cleansing at home with these Replacement Brush Heads for your Olay Pro-X Advanced Cleansing System or Microdermabrasion Plus Advanced Cleansing System.For best results, Olay Professional Pro-X Replacement Brush Heads should be changed every 3 months (or sooner if bristles become deformed). It's easy  just press the brush head onto the connection pin until it locks into position with a click. These soft bristle replacement face brush heads can be used with a broad range of Olay cleansers for deep daily cleansing. Professionally designed by dermatologists and Olay skin scientists, Pro-X Replacement Brush Heads remove dull skin cells and oils, giving your face a fresh and clean look. A complete skincare regimen means beautiful skin is just steps away. Keep spare brush heads handy, and your Pro-X Advanced Cleansing System will always operate at peak efficiency.
